title: Kanji Odyssey sentance pack
description:
For those of us learning Japanese via AJATT, sentences are very important to the learning process. These are the sentences for 2001.Kanji.Odyssey books 1 and 2.
http://www.alljapaneseallthetime.com

These books are very useful for learning Japanese, especially after completing James Heisig's Remembering the Kanji.
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/3399676/Remembering_the_kanji
If you like these books, buy them!

The first five hundred or so sentences are probably safe to use without checking, but after that you should probably check over the kana.

Use with an spaced repetition program like anki.

Please seed, and let other know where to find this torrent.

Fixed sentences for KO2001 101-150:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4353655
